name: Amazing camp ground
features: Each lot has power and water, Campfires allowed after 8pm and Wifi available

name: River's Edge Campground
features: River access for fishing and swimming, campfires allowed in designated areas, pet friendly

name: Pine Grove Campground
features: Wooded campsites with picnic tables and fire pits, flush toilets and hot showers, playground and basketball court

name: Bay of Fundy Campground
features: Oceanfront campsites with stunning views, access to hiking trails, on-site restaurant and gift shop

name: Grand Lake Camping
features: Private lakeside campsites, boat rentals available, camp store with groceries and supplies

name: Magnetic Hill Campground
features: Close to popular tourist attractions, including Magnetic Hill and Zoo, swimming pool and mini golf on site

name: Bayview Campground
features: Overlooking the Bay of Fundy, fully serviced lots with electrical, water, and sewer hookups, free wifi, and a heated swimming pool.

name: Woodsy Hollow Campground
features: Surrounded by lush forest, spacious lots with picnic tables, fire pits, and nearby hiking trails. No electricity or water hookups available.

name: Sandy Shoreline Campground
features: Located on a sandy beach, fully serviced lots with electrical, water, and sewer hookups, free hot showers, and a playground for kids.

name: Rustic Retreat Campground
features: Secluded sites in the woods, no electricity or water hookups available, campfires allowed, and a nearby stream for fishing.
